property.name: Home Site
property.value: Any site in Udûn or Imlad Morgul

card.name: Ent in Search of the Entwives
The Ring Will Have But One Master
Kill All But NOT the Halflings
Weigh All Things to a Nicety

property.name: Auto Attack
property.value: Undead - 1 strike with 6 prowess; each character wounded must make a corruption check modified by -2

property.name: Auto Attack
property.value: (1st) Hobbits - 5 strikes with 5 prowess; (2nd) Dúnedain - 3 strikes with 11 prowess

property.name: Playable
property.value: Information, Items (minor, major, greater*, gold ring) *-hero item only

property.name: Special
property.value: Treat this site as a Darkhaven during the Untap Phase. Any gold ring item at this site is automatically tested during the site phase (the site need not be entered). All ring tests at this site are modified by -3.

property.name: Auto Attack
property.value: Undead - 1 strike with 8 prowess; each character wounded must make a corruption check modified by -2

property.name: Auto Attack
property.value: Men - each character faces 1 strike with 10 prowess (detainment against covert company)

property.name: Auto Attack
property.value: Dúnedain - each character faces 1 strike with 7 prowess (detainment against covert company)

property.name: Special
property.value: Agent minions may be brought into play under direct influence at this site.

property.name: Auto Attack
property.value: Men - each character faces 1 strike with 7 prowess (detainment against covert company)

property.name: Playable
property.value: Items (minor, major*) *-weapon, armor, shield, or helmet only

property.name: Special
property.value: Unless this site is a character's home site, a non-Orc, non-Troll character may not be brought into play at this site. Any Gold Ring stored at this site is automatically tested (modify the roll by -2). Any attack against a minion company at this site is canceled.

property.name: Auto Attack
property.value: Men - each character faces 1 strike with 5 prowess (detainment against covert company)

property.name: Auto Attack
property.value: Undead - 2 strikes with 8 prowess; each character wounded must make a corruption check modified by -2

property.name: Special
property.value: Non-Nazgûl creatures played at this site attack normally, not as detainment.

property.value: (1st) Men - each character faces 1 strike with 8 prowess (detainment against covert company); (2nd) Dúnedain - 3 strikes with 10 prowess (against overt company only)

property.value: (1st) Troll - 1 strike with 9 prowess; (2nd) Wolves - 2 strikes with 8 prowess

property.name: Special
property.value: No character may be brought into play at this site (unless this site is the character's home site). Resources may never be stored at this site. Geann a-Lisch counts as a Ruins and Lairs for the purposes of playing and interpreting hazards. Its site path for this purpose, if needed, is the one from Carn Dûm.

property.value: Items may be played at this site even if it is tapped.

property.name: Auto Attack
property.value: (1st) Elves - each character faces 1 strike with 9 prowess (detainment against covert company); (2nd) Elves - 3 strikes with 10 prowess (against overt company only)

property.name: Special
property.value: If your Ringwraith is at this site, he may tap during the organization phase to bring one Orc or Troll character from your discard pile into play at this site (as another company). The character must move to a different site from that of your Ringwraith this turn or be discarded at the end of the movement/hazard phase.
